page.title: Careers
page.content:
Jobs come and go, but a job at EnerBank is a career. We truly value our people â€” hiring the best and brightest, then continuing to nurture that talent as team members develop their skills and move up through the organization over time. If you love to help people, thrive in a challenging environment, and are ready for the time of your life, consider joining us.

In addition to great career opportunities, there are so many more benefits to working at EnerBank.

  • Tuition reimbursement
  • 401k with company match
  • Advancement opportunities
  • Medical insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Competitive salary
  • Paid vacation (starting on the date of hire)
  • Generous sick time
  • 11 paid holidays yearly
  • Insurance available on date of hire
  • Vision insurance
  • Life insurance (employees and dependents)
  • Short-term disability
  • Long-term disability
  • FSA (Flexible Spending Account)
  • HSA (Health Savings Account) with company match
  • Stock purchase plan
  • Employee assistance service
  • Travel accident insurance
